content: Snack food maker Snyder's-Lance Inc  said it will buy Diamond Foods Inc  for about $1.27 billion to expand in the "better-for-you" foods category  which includes baked potato chips and fat-free popcorn.
name: Snyder's-Lance Inc
title: Snacks maker Snyder's-Lance to buy Diamond Foods for $1.27 billion

content: * Diamond Foods' shares up 9 pct premarket   (Adds details  background  shares)
name: Snyder's-Lance Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Snacks maker Snyder's-Lance to buy Diamond Foods for $1.27 bln

content: Oct 28 Kettle potato chips maker Diamond Foods Inc said it will be acquired by snacks maker Snyder's-Lance Inc for about $1.91 billion  including about $640 million in debt.
name: Snyder's-Lance Inc
title: Snacks maker Snyder's-Lance to buy Diamond Foods for $1.91 bln
